original_text: The male goat means the kingdom of Greece. The large horn between its eyes means the first king of Greece.
korean_text: 털이 많은 숫염소는 곧 헬라 왕이요 그의 두 눈 사이에 있는 큰 뿔은 곧 그 첫째 왕이요

sentences.original_text: The male goat means the kingdom of Greece.
The large horn between its eyes
means the first king of Greece.
